author: Special Correspondent
text:
DMK treasurer M.K. Stalin on Sunday said party leader M. Karunanidhi would reveal the details about the DMK’s electoral alliance at an appropriate time and urged the media not to speculate.

“It is my humble request. Do not speculate and undermine our efforts to forge an alliance,” Mr. Stalin told reporters at the Chennai Airport while leaving for Tiruchi to participate in international women’s day celebrations.

He said interviews with aspiring DMK candidates would be over only on Monday; after that Mr Karunanidhi would hold talks with prospective alliance partners and make a formal announcement on the composition of alliance.

Mr. Stalin said his party had made representation to the Election Commission (EC) about the poll code violations of the ruling AIADMK.

“The EC had promised to take action. If it fails to act on our complaints, we will take legal recourse,” he said.
title: Announcement on poll tie-up at right time: Stalin
